title: How many Hours have i spend
body: Where can i check how many hours have i spend over the past years ? and if it is runned by riot.

replies.body: We don't have an option to show how many hours someone has played, or when an account was created.  We also don't want to provide tenure like that, because it's a part of some account recovery questions we ask during cases of unauthorized access.  Instead, I like to suggest how long I've been playing in Seasons instead of time.  I've been playing since season 1!

i don't know what season I started in but I think it was like pre season 3 or something

all I remember is I was before ekko's release its been years and I've forgot due to the fact I'm always too busy hateing my life and playing league to help me ignore the fact humanity's gonna kill itself one day and I hope imp dead before that happens...

i dont know how to show pictures 
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
There's no markup code, so you just paste the URL! Check out this handy[ boards formatting 101](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/YHPBc6k3-board-formatting-101).  :D
Well I have started playing in season 4 but get interest in Lol in season 3 c:
